<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Legendary Rider](/Feats.aspx?ID=1930) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 165 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=53), [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170) (Level 20)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1919)

</column>

---

You and your mount move like one being, effortlessly reading each other's signals. Whenever you are riding your mount, you are [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32); you can use the extra action only to command your mount using the [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) skill action.
name: Legendary Rider
